message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds great value, worth $10000 to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $9500. We hope this offer aligns well with your expectations and budget.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We appreciate your feedback and understanding of its value. In light of your offer, we would like to counter with a price of $9000 for the product. We believe this strikes a balance between the intrinsic value of the product and your budget considerations.

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I'm still not comfortable with the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'd like to offer $8200 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We understand your position and would like to propose a price of $8700 for the product. We hope this offer is more in line with what you're looking for while still reflecting the value of the product.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to compromise. I'd like to offer $8000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, we are willing to accept an offer of $8500 for the product. We believe this price reflects both the value of the product and your budget constraints.
